author: Thomas Macaulay
title: AI snitches on naughty Brits who won’t stay home during coronavirus pandemic
description: The decision to place the UK on a police-enforced lockdown couldn’t have come sooner, new AI analysis of traffic footage has revealed. Until last night, Brits had been merely been advised to avoid “non-essential” travel. Not many of them were listening, accor…
content:
The decision to place the UK on a police-enforced lockdown couldnt have come sooner, new AI analysis of traffic footage has revealed.
Until last night, Brits had been merely been advised to avoid non-essential travel. Not many of them were listening, accordi… [+1498 chars]
